meanings.definition: A poisonous mushroom with a distinctive cap and stem.
meanings.sent1: The amanita mushroom should never be eaten as it is poisonous.
meanings.sent2: I found an amanita in the forest during our nature walk.
meanings.sent3: The amanita decided to play a prank by pretending to be a regular mushroom.
meanings.sent4: Her red umbrella looked like a vibrant amanita against the green backdrop.
meanings.sent5: The amanita's toxic nature serves as a warning to those who might mistake it for a safe mushroom.

meanings.definition: Any mushroom of the genus Amanita.
meanings.sent1: The field guide helped me identify the amanita among the various mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: Amanitas can be found in different shapes and sizes in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The amanita threw a party inviting all the other mushrooms from the forest.
meanings.sent4: The amanita stood out like a royal among the common mushrooms.
meanings.sent5: The amanita's presence signaled the start of mushroom season in the woods.
